attributes.action: Clean the bird faeces and dead pigeons off of the low bridge on West End Rd.
attributes.additional_details: The bridge is covered in dead birds and bird faeces and isn't a nice place to walk under for Ruislip locals.For this reason, it deserves to be cleaned of its grime.
attributes.background: The Ruislip community wants the low bridge cleaned of its unhygenic grime.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Local roads are the responsibility of your local authority, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You can also petition your local authority directly: https://modgov.hillingdon.gov.uk/mgePetitionListDisplay.aspx?bcr=1
